actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 212(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt from the literacy requirement of section 212(a)(25) certain additional relatives of United States citizens and permanent resident aliens.

summary.text: Exempts from the literacy requirement provisions for admission to the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, the son, brother, sister, uncle, or aunt of U.S. citizens and permanent resident aliens. (Amends 8 U.S.C. 1182(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 212(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt from the literacy requirement of section 212(a)(25) certain additional relatives of United States citizens and permanent resident aliens.
